text: Presidential elections were held in Portugal on 24 January 2021. The incumbent President, Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa, was reelected in a landslide victory with 60.7% of the vote. ==Results== Summary of the 24 January 2021 Portuguese presidential election results |-
